name: OHIO ASSOCIATION OF CONVENTION & VISITORS BUREAUS (OACVB)
description: OACVB is an association of destination marketing organizations in Ohio.
sampleDescriptions: Expansion of the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) to nonprofit (c)(6) organizations and DMOs; funding and other federal issues affecting the travel and tourism industry in Ohio

Status of non-profit (c)(6) entities and Destination Marketing Organizations (DMOs) within the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) created under the CARES Act (H.R. 748; PL 116-136).  Questions and issu
General issues and questions related to legislation supporting travel and tourism, and specifically, DMOs, including the status of non-profit Destination Marketing Organizations (DMOs) within the PPP
